text:
1. Page Title: Raskolnikov's Tavern Encounter

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Raskolnikov stands near a dark tavern.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: "I’ve never been in a tavern."
       • Raskolnikov: "But I need a drink…"

   - Panel 2 — Setup: He sits at a sticky table, beer in hand.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: "Just a glass of beer…"
       • Raskolnikov: "My mind is clearer now!"

   - Panel 3 — Setup: He looks around cheerfully, feeling lighter.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Raskolnikov: "How petty my worries are!"
       • Raskolnikov: "I feel free at last!"

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, feeling giddy and tormented by thirst, enters a tavern for the first time, seeking solace in beer to clear his mind.
